Tsunade punches the ground, creating a massive shockwave. Using it as a cover, Orochimaru summons three Rashōmon gates, creating them in the form of a triangle, trapping the opponent in between. Then, Orochimaru and Jiraiya use [[Wind]] and [[Fire Release]] respectively to create a huge fiery vortex. Tsunade jumps into the flames and, after activating her [[Yin Seal]], delivers a punch strong enough to break the gates in an explosion.

[[pt-br:Pulando no Buraco de Fogo e Vento]]
